column2:
"No, that was amazing!
Your moves have been burned into my mind.
I'm jealous of what good experience you're gaining!"

"So I guess with an enemy like that, it's best
to go for its weak point right away, with
everything you've got."

"I'm gonna remember that for future use.
Thanks, friend!"

"いやほんとスゴかったなぁー！
動きがオレの目に焼き付いてるよ。
いい経験を積めてうらやましいぜ！"

"やっぱ、ああいう相手には
即座に弱点へ一撃必殺、だよな！"

"オレも参考にさせてもらうぜ！
ありがとな！"
